mapper.insert: insert into apartmentinfo1 (AptNum, bedrooms, bathrooms, livingrooms, area, facing, city, district, community, whichfloor, totalfloor) values (#{AptNum},#{bedrooms},#{bathrooms},#{livingrooms},#{area},#{facing},#{city},#{district},#{community},#{whichfloor},#{totalfloor})

insert into apartmentinfo2 ( AptNum, elevator, parking, internet, bed, sofa, chair, TV, AC, refrigerator, washer, gas, colony) values (#{AptNum},#{elevator},#{parking},#{internet},#{bed},#{sofa},#{chair},#{TV},#{AC},#{refrigerator},#{washer},#{gas},#{colony})

insert into apartmentinfo3( AptNum, allCharged, together, split, decoration, price, moveinDate, waterFee, electricityFee, gasFee, InternetFee, communityFee, wireFee, parkingFee, pet, smoking, isKey, checkAptTime, description) values (#{AptNum},#{allCharged},#{together},#{split},#{decoration},#{price},#{moveinDate},#{waterFee},#{electricityFee},#{gasFee},#{InternetFee},#{communityFee},#{wireFee},#{parkingFee},#{pet},#{smoking},#{isKey},#{checkAptTime},#{description})
insert into apartmentinfo4( AptNum, url1) values (#{AptNum},#{imgUrl})
